title: Annie is viable in all roles.
body:
Top: Very safe farming and is decent in all-ins. Can still do decent damage with an ap bruiser build.
Jungle: Might have a rough early game, but has very good ganks with stun.
Mid: Full ap build annihilates everything.
ADC: Somewhat long auto attack range, high base damages, and on demand stun for self peel or engage.
Support: Tibbers stun is an amazing initiate and is also a great peeling tool, high base damages means she is still a threat even with a support build.
